overview:
Chung-Wei’s working experiences basically located in digital, media and creative space. He used to work for Lycos.com and Yam.com in the internet booming years, Editor-in-chief of Intelligent Times, Esquire, and famous man’s magazine, Playboy. 4 years ago he started to work for Institute for Information Industry as the Advisory Planner in IDEAS institute, watching the most updated Innovation in Europe and States. In 2008, he founded Chili Consulting to help enterprises to make social media strategies. In 2011, he started another venture - Ricebird - to develop social applications.

His specialties: Social media strategy / Content strategy / Entertainment business research / Media production and its development
